ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Ghost faction (was Treasure changes in Frontier Mou ntains)
ygData.msgSnippet: If you get to dubious with the guards you can give bone chips to the trooper in Field of Bones to raise all your other Cabilis factions as IIRC. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
If you get to dubious with the guards you can give bone chips to the trooper
in Field of Bones to raise all your other Cabilis factions as IIRC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Saturday, June 10, 2000 5:15 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Ghost faction (was Treasure changes in Frontier
Mou ntains)


it depends, there are at least 4 different factions in cabilis. you may
just be ok with the guards.

Shada

> I haven't

> Galtin
